name: Attack of the Bugs
description: "Much better than it looks!" Can virtual reality REALLY give you goosebumps? Attack of the Bugs is not just a shooter: a unique mix of strategy, action and humor that'll make you scream!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and up Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 512 MB available space
